document.full_text: video footage of summary executions apparently committed during the sri lankan civil war appears to be convincing evidence of "serious international crimes," a u.n. special envoy said on monday.
document.title: sri lanka war atrocities video credible: u.n. envoy
lines_and_colors: video footage of summary executions apparently committed during the sri lankan civil war appears to be convincing evidence of "serious international crimes," a u.n. special envoy said on monday.
